markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Flair](/Feats.aspx?ID=1862) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 153 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Swashbuckler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=43)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Flair](/Feats.aspx?ID=1860)

</column>

---

You gain one [swashbuckler feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=15/feats). For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your swashbuckler level is equal to half your character level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another swashbuckler feat.
name: Advanced Flair
